tagline.title: FULL DAY TANAH LOT TOUR IS ONE DAY TOUR PACKAGES FOR ENJOY VISITING ICONIC HANDARA GATE, ULUN DANU BERATAN LAKE AND TEMPLE, TAMAN AYUN TEMPLE AND TANAH LOT TEMPLE WITH SUNSET VIEW
tagline.text: FULL DAY TANAH LOT TOUR IS ONE DAY TOUR PACKAGES FOR ENJOY VISITING ICONIC HANDARA GATE, ULUN DANU BERATAN LAKE AND TEMPLE, TAMAN AYUN TEMPLE AND TANAH LOT TEMPLE WITH SUNSET VIEW
tagline.html: FULL DAY TANAH LOT TOUR IS ONE DAY TOUR PACKAGES FOR ENJOY VISITING ICONIC HANDARA GATE, ULUN DANU BERATAN LAKE AND TEMPLE, TAMAN AYUN TEMPLE AND TANAH LOT TEMPLE WITH SUNSET VIEW

description.text: Full Day Tanah Lot Tour is a Bali Full Day Tour Packages to visit the beauty of the tourist destinations Iconic Handara Gate, Ulun Danu Beratan Lake Temple, Taman Ayun Temple and Tanah Lot Temple with amazing sunset view, a very impressive one day adventure tour where you will be able to find out more about the culture of the island of Bali and its beauty nature in Bali. Our driver will pick you up at your place of stay in the morning and head to the Iconic Handara Gate to see the beauty of the gate with very beautiful Balinese carvings, enjoy taking photos at this gate, continue to Ulun Danu Beratan Temple is a tourist destination to see the beauty of the temple Ulun Danu which is located on Lake Beratan, continue to the restaurant to enjoy lunch at the restaurant with very delicious Indonesian food, after lunch continue to Taman Ayun Temple which is a tourist destination to see the beauty of the garden and the sacred temple which is the mother temple from Mengwi kingdom in ancient times, continue to Tanah Lot Temple is a sacred Hindu temple which functions as a sea temple, located on a rock on the beach with a very beautiful view of the sunset with a very beautiful ocean background. It is a very impressive experience to enjoy the sunset on the island of Bali, after that the driver will take you back to the hotel with a very impressive experience on a one day tour to Tanah Lot Temple, with an experienced and friendly driver who will make the trip even more enjoyable very

title.title: Handara Gate | Full Day Tanah Lot Tour

image.title: Full Day Tanah Lot Tour | Handara Gate | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Handara Gate is first site we will visit during Full Day Tanah Lot Tour, handara gate is a tourist destination to see and take photos at the gate with very beautiful Balinese architecture. Many tourists stop here and take photos at this gate and upload the photos on social media, making this place very popular among photo lovers. Handara Gate is a gate leading to the Golf Resort, because the very beautiful gate with a forest background makes this place one of the places not to be missed if passing through this area. With an ancient looking gate made of red brick carved with typical Balinese carvings, the scenery is very instagrammable and looks like an ancient one that reads its own uniqueness that is liked by tourists, a very impressive experience and enjoy the experience of taking photos at the Iconic gate

button.title: Handara Gate | Full Day Tanah Lot Tour

title.title: Full Day Tanah Lot Tour | Ulun Danu Beratan Temple

image.title: Full Day Tanah Lot Tour | Ulun Danu Beratan Temple | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Ulun Danu Beratan Temple is second site we will visit during Full Day Tanah Lot Tour, is a tourist destination for the Ulun Danu temple and Lake Beratan in the Bedugul area, a holy place for Hindus dedicated to worshiping the Goddess Ulun Danu at Lake Beratan. This temple was built in the 17th Century and is classified as one of the ancient temples found in Bali Island. The uniqueness of this temple is that this temple is located on Lake Beratan, and when the lake water rises it looks like this temple is floating on Lake Beratan. Another unique thing about this temple is that there is a Buddhist Stupa located outside the temple area, which can be concluded if long ago there was religious tolerance between Hindus and Buddhists which is evidence of harmony within the community on that era
description.html: Ulun Danu Beratan Temple is second site we will visit during Full Day Tanah Lot Tour, is a tourist destination for the Ulun Danu temple and Lake Beratan in the Bedugul area, a holy place for Hindus dedicated to worshiping the Goddess Ulun Danu at Lake Beratan. This temple was built in the 17th Century and is classified as one of the ancient temples found in Bali Island. The uniqueness of this temple is that this temple is located on Lake Beratan, and when the lake water rises it looks like this temple is floating on Lake Beratan. Another unique thing about this temple is that there is a Buddhist Stupa located outside the temple area, which can be concluded if long ago there was religious tolerance between Hindus and Buddhists which is evidence of harmony within the community on that era

title.title: Taman Ayun Temple | Full Day Tanah Lot Tour

image.title: Full Day Tanah Lot Tour | Taman Ayun Temple | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Taman Ayun Temple is third site we will visit during Full Day Tanah Lot Tour, is a tourist destination for visiting the sacred temple in Mengwi village which is the mother temple of Mengwwi village where in ancient times there was the Mengwi kingdom here and this temple was the Mother Temple (Paibon) to Mengwi Kingdom, with a very beautiful garden design and buildings. which still maintains the characteristics of the past, making this tourist spot very popular among tourists to see the beauty of the gardens and the beautiful temple entrance gate with carvings characteristic of Balinese artists. Taman Ayun is considered to have historical value, and therefore the Balinese government recommended that the Taman Ayun temple be included in Unesco's World Heritage List in 2002.
description.html: Taman Ayun Temple is third site we will visit during Full Day Tanah Lot Tour, is a tourist destination for visiting the sacred temple in Mengwi village which is the mother temple of Mengwwi village where in ancient times there was the Mengwi kingdom here and this temple was the Mother Temple (Paibon) to Mengwi Kingdom, with a very beautiful garden design and buildings. which still maintains the characteristics of the past, making this tourist spot very popular among tourists to see the beauty of the gardens and the beautiful temple entrance gate with carvings characteristic of Balinese artists. Taman Ayun is considered to have historical value, and therefore the Balinese government recommended that the Taman Ayun temple be included in Unesco's World Heritage List in 2002.

button.title: Taman Ayun Temple | Full Day Tanah Lot Tour

title.title: Tanah Lot Temple | Full Day Tanah Lot Tour

image.title: Full Day Tanah Lot Tour | Tanah Lot Temple | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Tanah Lot Temple is fourth site we will visit during Full Day Tanah Lot Tour, is a tourist destination to see the holy Tanah Lot Temple or better known as the Floating Sea Temple, because of the uniqueness of this temple which is located on a rock on the beach, if the sea water is high it will look like the Tanah Lot Temple is floating on The ocean, a very impressive sight, apart from that there is holy water under the rocks, where this holy water comes from the springs here, the unique thing is that this holy water is not sea water but fresh water that comes out of the ground. This place is very famous for tourists to see the sunset, because the sunset view here is very beautiful with a very enchanting ocean backdrop, It is a very rare experience to enjoy the beauty of temples and sunsets during a holiday on the island of Bali

price.title: Full Day Tanah Lot Tour Price :
price.content:
Full Day Tanah Lot Tour Price :

The tour we provide is Based on Private Tour, We offer two price you can choose which is Regular Tours Price and Inclusive Tours Price, Please see below the details of West Bali Tour Packages price :

Regular Tours Price :

IDR 550,000/car ( 1 till 6 person included)
IDR 850,000/minibus ( 1 till 12 person included)
IDR 1,250,000/minibus ( 1 till 17 person included)
IDR 2,500,000/bus ( 1 till 30 person included)
Inclusion : Private Car / Minibus / Bus with Good A/C + Petrol + English Speaking Driver
Note : Parking Fee, Entrance fee and Lunch is not include in the price

Or

Inclusive Tours Price :

IDR 700,000/person
Note : For Inclusive Price is minimun Booking 2 Person
Inclusion : Private Car / Minibus / Bus with Good A/C + Petrol + Parking Fee + English Speaking Driver + Entrance Fee + Lunch Indonesian Food + Mineral Water

content.event: Visit Bali Handara Gate
Visit Ulun Danu Beratan Temple
Visit Taman Ayun Temple
Visit Tanah Lot Temple

inclusion:
Seminyak, Legian, Kuta, Nusa Dua, Jimbaran, Pecatu, Sanur, Ubud, Canggu, Denpasar, Benoa Harbour, Airport
Please contact us for pick up in different area

• The price already include with 21% Government tax and Services
  • Get special price for group booking
  • Regular Tours Price : is a Bali day tours price without include lunch and entrance fee, you need to pay by your own self
  • Inclusive Tours Price : is a Bali day tours price with include lunch and entrance fee
  • The tour is Private Tours, means there is no other participant, just only you and your companion
  • The Tour will assist by English Speaking Tours Driver
  • Tour Guide can be requested, contact us if you want to request Tour Guide during the trip
  • Time and Tourism site is subject to change based on your request.
  • Use contact form provide to send us message, asking information or make tour booking request.

• Payment is Cash Payment
  • Payment is on the day itself with our driver
  • Payment with other currency will convert based on daily exchange rate
